scripts.serve: concurrently --raw "tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module es2015 --declaration --declarationDir types --outDir esm -watch" "yarn serve:playground"
scripts.build: rimraf -rf lib esm dist && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm && yarn build:umd
scripts.release:major: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:alpha: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i prerelease --preid alpha ) && yarn build && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:beta: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i prerelease --preid beta ) && yarn build && npm publish --tag beta
